electricityContract.terms: Please visit www.redenergy.com.au/terms for full T&Cs applicable to this offer. Solar Feed-In T&Cs can be found at www.redenergy.com.au/solar-feed-in-tariffs. We will issue your bill at least quarterly, or if you have a Smart Meter, monthly, unless you have requested to be billed quarterly or your Smart Meter does not have active telecommunications.
electricityContract.variation: We may vary your rates in line with our Terms and Conditions and in accordance with the Relevant Laws. We will give you written notice of at least 5 business days prior to the variation.

incentives.eligibility: Get 10,000 bonus Qantas Points when you pay your first electricity bill in full, and 2 Qantas Points per $1 on every electricity bill when you pay on time. For T&Cs see redenergy.com.au/terms

eligibility.information: This offer is available to new residential customers and existing residential customers moving or adding a new property within the Citipower distribution zone with applicable network tariff, and who have a valid Qantas Frequent Flyer Membership. For more information phone Red Energy on 131 806.

demandCharges.description: Demand calculation is based on the maximum measured interval consumption occurring between 3pm - 9pm Monday to Friday including public holidays.
Demand calculation is based on the maximum measured interval consumption occurring between 3pm - 9pm Monday to Friday including public holidays.

greenPowerCharges.description: Red Energy offers 100% GreenPower for an extra 3.3 cents per kWh. Please contact us on 131 806 for more information.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Your contract is ongoing until it is ended by you or us
